info.title: Contact Management RESTful API
info.description: OpenAPI for Contact Management RESTful API

patch.description: Update current user but only the name

errors.default: Email format invalid, phone formar invalid, ...

200.description:
name : String, contact first name or last name, using like query, optional
phone : String, contact phone, using like query, optional
email : String, contact email, using like query, optional
page : Integer, start from 0, default 0
size : Integer, default 10

errors.default: Email format invalid, phone formar invalid, ...
Email format invalid, phone formar invalid, ...
Contact not found or address not found
Contact not found or address not found
Contact not found or address not found

ContactManagementAuth.description: Authentication for Contact Management RESTful API
ContactManagementAuth.name: X-API-KEY
